original_text:
“This is to be the boundary of the land:
“On the north side it will run from the Mediterranean Sea by the Hethlon road past Lebo Hamath to Zedad,
korean_text: 이 땅 경계선은 이러하니라 북쪽은 대해에서 헤들론 길을 거쳐 스닷 어귀까지니

sentences.original_text: This is to be the boundary of the land:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 그 땅의 경계가 될 것이다:

sentences.original_text: On the north side it will run from the Mediterranean Sea
by the Hethlon road past Lebo Hamath
sentences.korean_translation: 헤슬론 길을 따라 레보 하맛을 지나
